about_the_game:
Mercenary Battle Company: The Reapers is a fast-paced, roguelite, bullet heaven game where you pilot giant mecha robots and fight off hordes of alien creatures known as the Xeni.

Different pilots are available for your mecha robots, each with their unique special abilities, different weapons and mech attachments. But why did the pilots choose such a precarious job?

There are endless ways to annihilate the Xeni! Vaporize them with a Flamethrower or disintegrate them with the EMP. Poison them, shock them, freeze them, and if all else fails, make them explode with the Pulsar Cannon or explosive bullets.

Delve into the heart of the Xeni swarm!

Backstory

Through expeditions for exploration, resources and relocation, the ever-growing population of mankind stretched far across the numerous galaxies. Major corporations were the foremost players in the race for expeditions since the scope for commerce and expansion was unimaginable.

After Ether was discovered, it became the definitive fuel source for civilization. But with Ether came a threat! Hostile alien creatures, termed as ‘Xeni', feed on Ether and infest planets with large Ether reservoirs. The Reaper Division, or simply 'The Reapers’, is an infamous division formed by the Mercenary Battle Company to exterminate swarms of these pests for safe Ether mining.

You have one job as a Reaper: eradicate the Xeni at any cost!

Features

  • Extermination: Exterminate the hordes of Xeni to survive and evolve.
  • Higher Risks, Even Higher Rewards: Fight epic boss fights and destroy Xeni nests to obtain unique rewards.
  • Assorted Weaponry: Equip your mech with combinations of different weapons and mech attachments.
  • Unique Builds: Discover unique synergies as you upgrade your mech how you want to and create overpowered builds.
  • Peculiar Pilots: Choose between unique pilots with each one offering different abilities.
  • Meta Progression: Craft different internal components for your mech with DNA obtained from the Xeni to delve deeper into the heart of the swarm.

content_descriptors.notes: Mercenary Battle Company: The Reapers contains violence against alien creatures and purple alien gore from a top down perspective.
